Description for option 2

 import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; interface CardOption { value: string; image: string; } @Component({ selector: 'app-card-selection', templateUrl: './card-selection.component.html', styleUrls: ['./card-selection.component.scss'], }) export class CardSelectionComponent { constructor() {} public cardOptions: CardOption[] = [ { value: 'front seat', image: '../../assets/images/front-seat.png' }, { value: 'back seat', image: '../../assets/images/rear-seat.png' }, ]; // public selectedCards: string[] = []; // public selectedItem: any = {}; // ngOnInit() { // console.log(this.selectedCards); // } // setItem(item: any) { // this.selectedItem = item; // } // goToNextPage() { // // this.selectedCards.push(item); // } selectedOption: string = ""; selectedAnswer: string[] = []; goToNextPage() { this.selectedAnswer.push(this.selectedOption); // Navigate to the second page } }
